creator: pregan@crt.xerox.com
text:
The Message Driven Bean (MDB) class file is not being included in the generated 
jar file when you run the ejbjar task under WebLogic 7.  Possibly related to 
bug 7871.  The steps I took to recreate this bug are :

1 - Create your MDB descriptors and MDB classes
2 - Run ejbjar and then inspect the jar file and you will notice that the MDB 
class is not in there (as it should be).

This works for me on the 7.00 Beta MDB example.

Can you try the latest nightly build and let me know if it is still an issue. IN
that case a small testcase would be helpful.
